name: clay-archive-uploader
description: Automated uploader for Clay Archive 3D models

scripts.build: rimraf public dist _static build && mkdirp public dist _static build && cpy css/**/* public/css/ && cpy js/**/* public/js/ && cpy catalog/**/* public/catalog/ && cpy *.html public/ && cpy public/**/* dist/ && cpy public/**/* _static/ && cpy public/**/* build/
